column4: I've run into some problems.  I just installed Madwifi-ng on my toshiba satellite and i have a perfect wireless connection with these drivers.  I have an Atheros AR5006EG (so lspci says) wireless adapter (built-in).  My problem is that I have kismet installed on this laptop but when I run sudo kismet, i'm told the following: http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/d55246789  IFCONFIG shows eth0, lo, and wlan0
here is my kismet.conf file  http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/m5728f9de
what else in there should I modify?
